name: Aparthotel Stare Maiasto

title: Stay in the heart of City
description: Located a 5-minute walk from St. Florian's Gate in Krakow, Tower Street Apartments has accommodations with air conditioning and free WiFi.The units come with hardwood floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a flat - screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer.A fridge is also offered, as well as an electric tea pot and a coffee machine.Popular points of interest near the apartment include Cloth Hall, Main Market Square and Town Hall Tower.The nearest airport is John Paul II International Krak贸w - Balice, 16.1 km from Tower Street Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
